compatibility.notes: GFDL-1.2 is a strong copyleft license, meaning that any derivative work must also be distributed under the same license. This can lead to incompatibility with permissive licenses.

key_requirements: The Document must be distributed under the same license terms.
Any derivative work must also be free and carry the same license.
license.name: GFDL-1.2
obligations: You must include a copy of this license when distributing the Document.
You must preserve the notice of copyright and the license in all copies or substantial portions of the Document.
You must state changes made to the Document if you modify it.
You must keep Invariant Sections intact if they are included in the Document.
